extendedInfo.description: The illuminati have spread a deadly virus to reduce the world population drastically. You have to fight against a range of muttans zombies and survive the new world order virus !

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I love this types of games, needs more maps and mele wepeons, but otherqise the game is great, i love it keepup the good work anthony
reviews.author: EL Gringo

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: It needs more maps and better aiming but over all it is a good game. Better than most

reviews.title: G
reviews.comment: The game is good but it would be better if you can put more maps in the game and better aiming I will give you five stars until there is a new update.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It\'s actually a great start. This game plus bigger maps that are outside. Plus multiplayer severs. Equal the greatest survival zombie game on mobile ever.

reviews.title: Good game but....
reviews.comment: I have problem in saving distress babes sometimes they are hard to find and sometimes I have only few seconds to kill zombies to save girls can you fix this
reviews.author: Bobby Galzote

reviews.title: Samsung  Galaxy  S2
reviews.comment: A  Great  game,  graphics  are  great.  Controls  are  Quite  good.  But  when  aiming  your  gun  at  a  zombie  its  hard  to  aim  your  gun  properly  because  the  Zombies  move  to  fast.  Please  make  the  aiming  Cross  bigger  because  you   have  a  job  seeing  it. Secondly  Please  slow  the  sombies  down  a  bit. Great  game  though   but  in  the  tunnel  its  hard  to  see  the  little  white  aiming  cross.            a  great  idea.   BUT  PLEA%
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 FIVE STARS all the way!!!!
reviews.comment: Okay when I saw a lot of low ratings I didn\'t really know what to expect of the game itself, but I had assured my self the game would probably let me down with severe problems such as bad control scheme and choppy graphics....But man was I wrong This game has it all!!! Guns,zombies,action and hours of replayability..When I 1st started the game I was stunned with the amazing 3 Demensional graphics But that wasn\'t all the Guns modeling was great...this game may be one of the best survival game I\'ve played till date...It can compete with tittles such as Dead trigger and call of duty black ops zombies, My only complaint is that once playin for about 15 minutes You will encounter lag a fix to that would be gladly appreciated, the reason may be because of the Zombies..Besides that its an overall sensational game...I would gladly pay 5$ or more for this title....Things I might want to see in the near future- More maps,more guns,co-op play and online 1 team survivor other team Undead..Keep up the good work guys (:
reviews.author: feliciano garcia

reviews.comment: This is bullshit after I kill the very first zombie if the game the game shuts down wtf FIX IT PLEASE then I will give you full stars\tThis is bullshit after I kill the very first zombie if the game the game shuts down wtf FIX IT PLEASE then I will give you full stars ll stars
reviews.author: alex harris

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: I like the Darkness & creepiness 2 this game it makes it unique for a android game.The axe swings are kinda difficult at times,on some zombies I can swing & it won\'t do anything 2them & others times it will kill them instantly.I think it would be cool 2hv a map, more weapons,a dog and clues or hints.Other than that this is one of my favorite zombie games on android ..i say-keep working on making it better and better because the ideal that you guys came up with rocks.

reviews.title: Wow terriable!
reviews.comment: Another game where IAPs are a total scam. You simply NEVER get what you paid for. No lags or errors, the game plays fine my device is top notch. But NOTHING purchaced is ever delivered ether! Wrote the scamster designer-NO REPLY, BIG SHOCK! I gave the scumbag TWO MONTHS, no reply & no honoring my purchase. Total theft!
